Title: The Last Waltz
Plot: As Karen's wedding to Bill nears, Hank struggles with accepting what appears to be inevitable. Bill informs Mia that he will not allow her book to be published and Hank has a unique solution to dealing with Becca's surprise visitor.
Writer: Gina Fattore, Eric Weinberg, Tom Kapinos
GuestStars: Christen Sussin, Charlie Mattera, Lyn Alicia Henderson, John C. McLaughlin, Myles Trifon, Robert Gilling, Jory Glick, Shira Kreitenberg
